attributes.review: The recent events in our nation have showed me that not only is Donald Trump uneducated and not fit for the job as president of the United States but he also has an inability to unite the country in a time of need. Beyond that, his approach to the coronavirus situation was completely unacceptable and his continuous comments on certain matters such as the way he glorifies certain behaviors has made me sick to my stomach. He then had the audacity to go in front of a church and pose for a photo shoot and hold the Bible, itâ€™s like he has absolutely no conscience or respect for himself or the country. These are the main few reasons why I change my mindset and will not ever support Donald Trump or this terrible app that he has created.
attributes.title: A change in mindset

attributes.review: I came on this app to find One only one reason why people think Trump is a good president or even a good person. Yet the second I go into it I find a million more reasons why this man is horrible. He should be arrested and anyone who supports him is just. WOW. This is terrible. If you support him you are a racist hypocrite. You say your pro second amendment but god for bit a black teen pic up a water gun right. You say your pro life but donâ€™t care about the kids that are in cages and yet you have to make sure that a teenage girl doesnâ€™t get an abortion even if she doesnâ€™t want to have the child of the man who raped her. This is not making â€œAmerica Great Againâ€ this is making it Segregated Again.
attributes.title: Ignorance is bliss

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about the presidents campaign for the upcoming year. The first thing I saw were multiple articles about Joe Biden! They even had question of the days for him! Isnâ€™t this app supposed to be about Trump? Almost every article when scrolling through the â€œnewsâ€ section had something to do with Joe Biden. Who do you think I am? I came to this app to learn about Trump NOT Biden. The next grievance I have is that the app wanted to use my location. Excuse me?!?!? You will not track me! And finally, this app seems more like a game than an actually news source. You earn points to get prizes! No thanks! I will stick to FOX News and the words of OUR president!
attributes.title: Terrible App
